channel.title: git on A Hugo website
channel.description: Recent content in git on A Hugo website

item.title: Git help
item.description: Git is a free and open source distributed version control system. working directory. staging area(index). git repository. three different objects generate from git cmd and describe in Hash: blob: only save the content of the file instead the file name. tree: the file name. commit: the first commit also called root commit. git basic git init: generate a file called /.git/ used ls -a to see all the hided files.
